item.title: Benefits of Frankincense in Skincare: A Natural Anti-Aging Ingredient
item.description: Benefits of Frankincense in Skincare Frankincense has been used for centuries in skincare and healing. When added to tallow balm NZ, it boosts skin repair, elasticity, and hydration. 1.
